name: Scurry and Devour
description:
Scurry and Devour is a 2d endless runner where player play as a Slime and it's objective is to survive in its natural habitat. 
Avoid deadly falls and evil plants by jumping over them and keep eating so the Slime could have enough of energy to keep running.
Control: press Space for Low Jump and hold Space for High Jump

Game made by Analisse and David.
